message.name: ID_SCRIPT_IDENTIFIER_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The identifier must be specified for the script.
message.cause: The identifier has not been specified for the script.
message.action: Specify an identifier for the script.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The script ID must be specified.
message.cause: The ID has not been specified for the script.
message.action: Specify an ID for the script.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_VERSION_NUMBER_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The script version number must be specified.
message.cause: The script version number has not been specified for the script.
message.action: Specify a script version number for the script.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The script type must be specified.
message.cause: The type has not been specified for the script.
message.action: Specify a type for the script.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_CONTAINS_NO_PAGES
message.locale: The script does not contain any pages.
message.cause: The script currently does not contain any pages.
message.action: Define one or more pages for the script.

message.name: ID_SCRIPT_CONTAINS_PAGES_AND_SECTIONS
message.locale: The script contains pages and sections at top-level.
message.cause: The script currently contains pages and sections at top-level.
message.action: All the pages should be under sections, or no section should be used.

message.name: ID_QUESTION_PAGE_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID of the question page must be specified.
message.cause: The ID has not been specified for the question page.
message.action: Specify the ID for the question page.

message.name: ID_RELATIONSHIP_PAGE_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID of the relationship page must be specified.
message.cause: The ID has not been specified for the relationship page.
message.action: Specify the ID for the relationship page.

message.name: ID_SUMMARY_PAGE_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID of the summary page must be specified.
message.cause: The ID has not been specified for the summary page.
message.action: Specify the ID for the summary page.

message.name: ID_ELEMENT_TITLE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A '%1s' title must be specified.
message.cause: The title has not been specified for this element.
message.action: Specify a title for this element.

message.name: ID_ELEMENT_TITLE_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID of the '%1s' title must be specified.
message.cause: An ID has not been specified for the title of this element.
message.action: Specify an ID for the title of this element.

message.name: ID_TEXT_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID of the '%1s' text must be specified.
message.cause: An ID has not been specified for the this text object.
message.action: Specify an ID for this text object.

message.name: ID_ARGUMENT_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID must be specified for an argument.
message.cause: An ID has not been specified for this argument.
message.action: Specify an ID for this argument.

message.name: ID_COLUMN_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID must be specified for a column.
message.cause: An ID has not been specified for this column.
message.action: Specify an ID for this column.

message.name: ID_SET_ATTRIBUTE_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID must be specified for a set attribute.
message.cause: An ID has not been specified for this set attribute.
message.action: Specify an ID for this set attribute.

message.name: ID_SET_ATTRIBUTE_EXPRESSION_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The expression must be specified for a set attribute.
message.cause: An expression has not been specified for this set attribute.
message.action: Specify an expression for this set attribute.

message.name: ID_VALIDATION_EXPRESSION_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The expression must be specified for a validation.
message.cause: An expression has not been specified for this validation.
message.action: Specify an expression for this validation.

message.name: ID_VALIDATION_MESSAGE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The message must be specified for a validation.
message.cause: A message has not been specified for this validation.
message.action: Specify a message for this validation.

message.name: ID_INVALID_LAYOUT_TYPE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: An invalid layout type has been specified for this '%1s'. It must be either "flow" or "compact-flow".
message.cause: An invalid layout type has been specified for this item.
message.action: Specify a valid layout type for this item.

message.name: ID_INVALID_LAYOUT_LABEL_ALIGNMENT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: An invalid label alignment has been specified for the layout of this '%1s'. It must be either "left", "right" or "center".
message.cause: An invalid label alignment has been specified for the layout of this item.
message.action: Specify a valid label alignment for the layout of this item.

message.name: ID_CONDITION_EXPRESSION_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The condition expression has not been specified.
message.cause: An expression has not been specified for this condition.
message.action: Specify an expression for this condition.

message.name: ID_EDIT_LINK_START_PAGE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The start page attribute for the edit link has not been specified.
message.cause: The start page attribute has not been specified for this edit link.
message.action: Specify a start page attribute for this edit link.

message.name: ID_EDIT_LINK_START_PAGE_NOT_IN_SCRIPT
message.locale: The start page identifier specified for the edit link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.cause: The start page identifier specified for the edit link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.action: Specify a valid page identifier for the start page attribute of this edit link.

message.name: ID_EDIT_LINK_END_PAGE_NOT_IN_SCRIPT
message.locale: The end page identifier specified for the edit link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.cause: The end page identifier specified for the edit link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.action: Specify a valid page identifier for the end page attribute of this edit link.

message.name: ID_ADD_LINK_START_PAGE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The start page attribute for the add link has not been specified.
message.cause: The start page attribute has not been specified for this add link.
message.action: Specify a start page attribute for this add link.

message.name: ID_ADD_LINK_START_PAGE_NOT_IN_SCRIPT
message.locale: The start page identifier specified for the add link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.cause: The start page identifier specified for the add link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.action: Specify a valid page identifier for the start page attribute of this add link.

message.name: ID_ADD_LINK_END_PAGE_NOT_IN_SCRIPT
message.locale: The end page identifier specified for the add link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.cause: The end page identifier specified for the add link does not refer to a page in the script.
message.action: Specify a valid page identifier for the end page attribute of this add link.

message.name: ID_ELEMENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_BY_PARENT_ELEMENT
message.locale: This element can not be contained within a '%1s' element.
message.cause: An incompatible element has been added to a parent element.
message.action: Remove the incompatible element from the parent element.

message.name: ID_EMPTY_CLUSTER_ROW
message.locale: Rows must contain at least one visible element.
message.cause: The row contains nothing but skip fields.
message.action: Add any visible element to the row.

message.name: ID_QUESTION_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The question attribute has not been specified for the question.
message.cause: The attribute has not been specified for the question.
message.action: Specify the attribute for the question.

message.name: ID_LIST_QUESTION_LABEL_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The label of the list question must be specified.
message.cause: The label has not been specified for the list question.
message.action: Specify the label for the list question.

message.name: ID_LIST_QUESTION_ITEM_LABEL_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: An item label must be specified for a list question.
message.cause: An item label has not been specified for the list question.
message.action: Specify an item label for the list question.

message.name: ID_LIST_QUESTION_LABEL_FOR_ITEM_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A label must be specified for a list question item.
message.cause: A label has not been specified for the list question item.
message.action: Specify a label for the list question item.

message.name: ID_LIST_QUESTION_ITEM_ATTRIBUTE_ID_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: An attribute id for a list question item must be specified.
message.cause: An attribute id has not been specified for the list question item.
message.action: Specify an attribute id for the list question item.

message.name: ID_LOOP_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The loop type must be specified.
message.cause: The loop type not been specified for the loop.
message.action: Specify a loop type for the loop.

message.name: ID_INVALID_LOOP_TYPE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The specified loop type is invalid. It must be either "for", "for-each" or "while".
message.cause: The specified loop type is invalid.
message.action: Specify a valid loop type for the loop.

message.name: ID_INVALID_PROGRESS_VALUE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The progress value is invalid. It must be a value between 0 and 100 inclusive.
message.cause: A value has been specified for the progress attribute which is outside the range of 0 and 100 inclusive.
message.action: Specify a value for the progress attribute which is within the range of 0 to 100 inclusive.

message.name: ID_ROWHELP_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID attribute has not been specified for the row-help element.
message.cause: The ID attribute has not been specified for the row-help element.
message.action: Specify the ID attribute for the row-help element.

message.name: ID_ROWHELP_TEXTS_CANNOT_HAVE_ALIASES
message.locale: An alias has been specified for a row help text on a list.
message.cause: An alias has been specified for a row help text on a list.
message.action: Remove the alias text for row help texts on lists.

message.name: ID_FOOTER_ROW_NOT_CORRECT_NUMBER_OF_ELEMENTS
message.locale: The footer row does not contain the correct number of elements, %1s expected but found %2s.
message.cause: The number of elements in the footer row is not equal to the total number of columns in the list.
message.action: Ensure the number of elements in the footer row is equal to the total number of columns in the list.

message.name: ID_FOOTER_ROW_CAN_NOT_BE_EMPTY
message.locale: The footer row cannot be empty.
message.cause: The footer row does not contain any elements.
message.action: Ensure the number of elements in the footer row is not equal to the total number of columns in the list.

message.name: ID_FOOTER_ROW_HAS_ONLY_SKIP_FIELDS
message.locale: The footer row only contains skip fields.
message.cause: The footer row does not contain any visible elements.
message.action: Ensure there is at least one visible element in the footer row.

message.name: ID_MULTIPLE_FOOTER_ROWS_NOT_SUPPORTED
message.locale: The list contains more than one footer row.
message.cause: The list contains more than one footer row.
message.action: Ensure the list contains no more than one footer row.

message.name: ID_FOOTER_FIELD_TYPE_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: A type has not been specified for the footer field.
message.cause: A footer field without a type has been added to the list.
message.action: Ensure the footer field has a type specified.

message.name: ID_FOOTER_FIELD_EXPRESSION_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: An expression has not been specified for the footer field.
message.cause: A footer field without an expression has been added to the list.
message.action: Ensure the footer field has an expression specified.

message.name: ID_FOOTER_FIELD_ID_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: An ID has not been specified for the footer field.
message.cause: A footer field without an ID has been added to the list.
message.action: Ensure the footer field has an ID specified.

message.name: ID_DUPLICATE_LIST_LINK
message.locale: Duplicate action links were specified for a list.
message.cause: Duplicate action links were specified for a list.
message.action: Remove one of the duplicate links.

message.name: ID_LINK_NOT_ALLOWED_IN_NON_SUMMARY_LIST
message.locale: An action link other than Delete was specified on a non-summary list.
message.cause: Only Delete links are supported on non-summary lists.
message.action: Remove the offending link.

message.name: ID_LINK_NOT_ALLOWED_IN_RELATIONSHIP_SUMMARY_LIST
message.locale: An action link other than Edit was specified on a relationship summary list.
message.cause: Only Edit links are supported on relationship summary lists.
message.action: Remove the offending link.

message.name: ID_INVALID_CLUSTER_ID
message.locale: The cluster ID '%1s' is not valid as it contains a comma.
message.cause: Cluster IDs can't contain commas.
message.action: Ensure the cluster ID doesn't contain any comma.

message.name: ID_DUPLICATE_CLUSTER_ID
message.locale: The cluster ID '%1s' has been defined multiple times on the page '%2s'.
message.cause: Cluster IDs have to be unique within a page.
message.action: Ensure cluster IDs defined on a page are all different.

message.name: ID_LIST_QUESTION_MAPPED_SAME_ATTRIBUTE_ERROR
message.locale: The list question '%1s' on the page '%2s' must have unique criteria.
message.cause: Multiple list questions mapped to the same entity and attribute must have unique criteria.
message.action: Ensure list questions mapped to the same entity and attrbute have unique criteria.

message.name: ID_INVALID_ID_IN_SHOW_PAGE_ELEMENTS
message.locale: The element ID '%1s' referenced from an edit-link does not exist on the page '%2s'.
message.cause: Script element IDs referenced on edit links have to exist on the page defined in 'start-page'.
message.action: Ensure element IDs referenced on an edit link exist on the page defined as the start page.

message.name: ID_SHOW_PAGE_ELEMENTS_NOT_SUPPORTED_ON_RELATIONSHIP
message.locale: The element ID '%1s' cannot be referenced from an edit-link on a 'relationship-summary-list' element.
message.cause: 'show-page-elements' attributes can only be defined on edit-links within 'cluster' or 'list' elements, but not within 'relationship-summary-list' elements.
message.action: Remove 'show-page-elements' attributes from edit-links within 'relationship-summary-list' elements.

message.name: ID_RELATIONSHIP_PAGE_NOT_CORRECT_NUMBER_OF_QUESTIONS
message.locale: The relationship page contains more than one question.
message.cause: The relationship page has more than one question defined.
message.action: Ensure the relationship page has at most one question defined.

message.name: ID_RELATIONSHIP_PAGE_NOT_CORRECT_NUMBER_OF_DISPLAYTEXTS
message.locale: The relationship page contains more than one display text.
message.cause: The relationship page has more than one display text defined.
message.action: Ensure the relationship page has at most one display text defined.

message.name: ID_INVALID_RESET_READONLY_VALUE
message.locale: The 'clear-read-only-value' question attribute can only be specified in conjunction with the 'read-only-expression' attribute.
message.cause: The 'clear-read-only-value' question attribute can only be specified in conjunction with the 'read-only-expression' attribute.
message.action: Remove the offending attribute.

message.name: ID_CUSTOM_OUTPUT_CLASS_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A class name must be specified for a 'custom-output' element.
message.cause: A class name was not entered into the 'class-name' attribute of the 'custom-output' element.
message.action: Specify a class name within the 'class-name' attribute for the 'custom-output' element.

message.name: ID_CUSTOM_OUTPUT_DATA_ACCESSOR_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A data accessor must be specified for a 'custom-output' element.
message.cause: A class name was not entered into the 'data-accessor' attribute of the 'custom-output' element.
message.action: Specify a class name within the 'data-accessor' attribute for the 'custom-output' element.

message.name: ID_INFORMATIONAL_MESSAGE_IMAGE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: An image path must be specified for an 'informational-message' element.
message.cause: An image path was not entered into the 'image' attribute of the 'informational-message' element.
message.action: Specify an image path within the 'image' attribute for the 'informational-message' element.

message.name: ID_INFORMATIONAL_MESSAGE_EXPRESSION_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: An expression must be specified for an 'informational-message' element.
message.cause: An expression was not entered into the 'expression' attribute of the 'informational-message' element.
message.action: Specify an expression within the 'expression' attribute for the 'informational-message' element.

message.name: ID_INVALID_REFERENCE_TO_PARENT_SCRIPT
message.locale: An invalid reference to the parent script '%1s' has been specified in the script '%2s'.
message.cause: An invalid reference to the parent script has been specified
message.action: Remove the reference.

message.name: ID_DUPLICATE_REFERENCES_TO_THE_SUBSCRIPT
message.locale: Duplicate references to the script '%1s' has been found in the scripts '%2s' and '%3s'.
message.cause: Duplicate calls to the same script from other scripts
message.action: Remove the duplicate references.

message.name: ID_DUPLICATE_REFERENCES
message.locale: Duplicate references to the script '%1s' has been found in the script '%2s'.
message.cause: Duplicate calls to the same script in the script
message.action: Remove the duplicate references.

message.name: ID_SUBSCRIPT_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: The subscript %1s' with version '%2s' and type '%3s' does not exist.
message.cause: The subscript does not exist.
message.action: Create the subscript

message.name: ID_TEXT_VALUE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The '%1s' text must be specified.
message.cause: A value has not been specified for the this text object.
message.action: Specify a value for this text object.

message.name: ID_ALIAS_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The type must be specified for an alias.
message.cause: A type has not been specified for this alias.
message.action: Specify a type for this alias.

message.name: ID_ICON_CURRENT_IMAGE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The current image of an icon must be specified.
message.cause: The current image has not been specified for this icon.
message.action: Specify current image for this icon.

message.name: ID_ICON_DISABLED_IMAGE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The disabled image of an icon must be specified.
message.cause: The disabled image has not been specified for this icon.
message.action: Specify disabled image for this icon.

message.name: ID_ICON_ENABLED_IMAGE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The enabled image of an icon must be specified.
message.cause: The enabled image has not been specified for this icon.
message.action: Specify enabled image for this icon.

message.name: ID_ICON_HOVER_IMAGE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The hover image of an icon must be specified.
message.cause: The hover image has not been specified for this icon.
message.action: Specify hover image for this icon.

message.name: ID_ICON_IMAGE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The image of an icon must be specified.
message.cause: The image has not been specified for this icon.
message.action: Specify image for this icon.
